channel.title: Vbulletin major problem!
channel.description: Hello, i didn't know where to post this question but i need someone who is familiar with vbulletin 4.1's help. I was going through trying to fix my counters and somehow i messed something up on there and all the different forum posts and the different forum subjects are mixed up. Like for example if i open the news&announcement and click on one it put the news posted and mixed it with another recent thread posted. This is a horrible issue and i'm new to vbulletin i could really use as much help as someone could give me! THANK YOU!

item.title: Vbulletin major problem!
item.dc:creator: @xxlongbongxx xxlongbongxx
item.description:
@xxlongbongxx wrote:

I was afraid you were going to say that lol lots of coding i put into that but thanks i’ll have to mess around with that this weekend Is there some way to make it so when i re-install the vbulletin forum i wont lose all my coding i did on it?

Read full topic

item.title: Vbulletin major problem!
item.dc:creator: @Elux Elux
item.description:
@Elux wrote:

Unlucky re-install your forums.

Read full topic
